content: > simple dickey pattern you can knit in any shade to complete your ensemble patons yarns patons® classic wool 100 g/3 5 oz 00224 grey mix 2 balls or 00226 black 2 balls size 4 5 mm u s 7 knitting needles finishing sew shoulder and turtleneck seams from markers to cast on edge reversing last 4 ins 10 cm for turn back written directions are provided in pdf download revised july 2010 featured in patons july 2010 newsletter
